## ts-lib package

A small library for common math functions

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [avg(a, b, c)](./ts-lib.avg.md) | Calculate the average of three numbers |
|  [subtract(a, b)](./ts-lib.subtract.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Calculate the difference between two numbers |
|  [sum3(a, b, c)](./ts-lib.sum3.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Calculate the sum of three numbers |
